name: Akilah Lapure | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Akilah Lapure | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: Seasons is a 3D platform game where the player can experience and run through all the seasons from spring to autumn. In the game, there are various types of flowers scattered on the four islands. To complete the game, the player must collect at least 15 flowers all together within 3 minutes. Have fun playing!
